SELECT id, member_name, sex, employee_number, bumon_name, vending_machine FROM members
AND member_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%')
AND sex = #{sex}
AND employee_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{employeeNumber}, '%')
AND bumon_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bumonName}, '%')
AND vending_machine = #{vendingMachine}
ORDER BY id
